item.title: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MegaFon/Yota
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - MegaFon/Yota Network Maintenance

The MegaFon/Yota network in Russia will undergo planned maintenance, potentially causing intermittent delays in SMS delivery to MegaFon/Yota Russia handsets.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 26, 12:00 - 16:00 PST

Feb 21, 15:55 PST
Scheduled - The MegaFon/Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 26 February 2024 at 4:00 PDT/PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon/Yota Russia handsets.

item.title: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MegaFon/Yota
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - MegaFon/Yota Network Maintenance

Planned maintenance is underway for the MegaFon/Yota network in Russia from 19th to 21st February 2024. During this time, SMS delivery to MegaFon/Yota Russia handsets may experience intermittent delays.

Feb 21, 16:01 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 19, 12:00 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 16, 16:53 PST
Scheduled - The MegaFon/Yota network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 19 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon/Yota Russia handsets.



Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:



19 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 19 February 2024 at 16:00 PST

20 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 20 February 2024 at 16:00 PST

21 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 16:00 PST

Summary: Stour Marine network in the UK will undergo planned maintenance on February 29, 2024, from 14:00 to 17:00 PST. Intermittent delays in SMS delivery to and from Stour Marine UK handsets are expected during this time.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 29, 14:00 - 17:00 PST

Feb 21, 14:32 PST
Scheduled - The Stour Marine network in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 29 February 2024 at 14:00 PST until 29 February 2024 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Stour Marine UK handsets.

item.title: France and Germany Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Planned Maintenance in France and Germany

Our voice carrier partner in France and Germany will be conducting maintenance from 14:00 to 20:00 PST on March 12, 2024. Users may experience intermittent call disconnects and failures during this time. Summary: Planned maintenance in France and Germany may cause intermittent call issues from Twilio phone numbers.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 12, 14:00 - 20:00 PDT

Feb 21, 07:47 PST
Scheduled - Our Voice carrier partner in France and Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 March 2024 at 14:00 PST until 12 March 2024 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio France and Germany phone numbers.

item.title: Unable to Activate New Programmable Wireless SIMs
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 07:23 PST
Resolved - All SIMs that were affected by this incident and could not be reactivated from status "deactivated" are now in status "active". Customers that issued a request to activate new SIMs may need to issue the request again since many of those requests were aborted after a day. The incident is now resolved, and the service is operating normally at this time

Feb 21, 05:19 PST
Update - We are continuing to see recovery, with SIMs successfully activating. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 21, 03:19 PST
Update - We are continuing to see recovery, with SIMs successfully activating. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 21, 02:50 PST
Monitoring - We have deployed a fix, and are beginning to see recovery, with SIMs successfully activating. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 21, 01:51 PST
Update - We are continuing to experience an issue in which Programmable Wireless SIMs in "new" status are unable to be activated. We have identified the issue and are working on a resolution. We will provide another update in 1 hour, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 17:56 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate the issue where Programmable Wireless SIMs in "new" status are unable to be activated. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 13:54 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate the issue where Programmable Wireless SIMs in "new" status are unable to be activated. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 11:54 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate the issue where Programmable Wireless SIMs in "new" status are unable to be activated. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 10:53 PST
Investigating - We are investigating an issue where Programmable Wireless SIMs in "new" status cannot be activated. We are actively working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

item.title: SMS and MMS Incident Monitoring Services Temporarily Unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 07:00 PST
Resolved - The issue affecting our SMS and MMS incident monitoring services has been resolved, and services are operating normally at this time.

Feb 20, 07:36 PST
Update - We will continue to observe the SMS and MMS incident monitoring services for up to 24 hours to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update at 7:00 AM Pacific Time on 02/21/2024 or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 07:03 PST
Monitoring - Our SMS and MMS incident monitoring services are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 06:44 PST
Identified - Our engineers have identified the issue causing our SMS and MMS incident monitoring services to be unavailable, and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 06:30 PST
Investigating - Our engineers have detected a potential issue with our SMS and MMS incident monitoring services. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

item.title: Netherlands Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - KPN
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Planned Maintenance by KPN

Our carrier partner KPN is conducting planned maintenance on March 9, 2024, from 13:00 to 17:00 PST. Some API request failures for KPN customers may occur during this time. Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 9, 13:00 - 17:00 PST

Feb 13, 06:55 PST
Scheduled - Our carrier partner KPN is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 March 2024 at 13:00 PST until 09 March 2024 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for KPN customers.



Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

item.title: SMS Delivery Delays to US Cellular via a subset of Twilio short codes
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 04:04 PST
Resolved - We are no longer experiencing MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the US Cellular network in the USA. This incident has been resolved.

Feb 21, 03:09 PST
Update - We continue to observe recovery in MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the US Cellular network in the USA, from a subset of Twilio short code numbers. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 21, 02:39 PST
Monitoring - We are observing recovery in MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the US Cellular network in the USA, from a subset of Twilio short code numbers. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 minutes, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 21, 02:03 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 21, 01:25 PST
Update - We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the US Cellular network in the USA, from a subset of Twilio short code numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 21, 00:22 PST
Investigating - We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the US Cellular network in the USA, from a subset of Twilio short code numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour, or as soon as more information becomes available.

item.title: Users Unable to Update Their CPS Value in Twilio Console
item.content:encoded:
Feb 20, 13:44 PST
Resolved - The issue where the users were unable to update their CPS on Twilio console has been resolved. We can confirm that Twilio console is operating normally at this time.

Feb 20, 13:12 PST
Monitoring - Our team confirmed that the issue with Twilio console is solved. Users should now be able to update their CPS. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 12:41 PST
Update - We are investigating an issue with Twilio console where the users are unable to update their CPS. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Feb 20, 12:24 PST
Investigating - We've become aware of a potential issue with users not able to update their CPS value in Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
